name: work-order-server
description: Backend for a simple work order management system.

scripts.install-run-win: concurrently --kill-others "md mongodb & start mongod --dbpath=./mongodb" "npm i & node server"
scripts.install-run-mac: concurrently --kill-others "mkdir mongodb; start mongod --dbpath=./mongodb;" "npm i; node server;"

author: Jesse Wheeler
